I currently am a 2nd year PhD student at the Barcelona Institute for Global Health (ISGlobal). I work under the supervision of Prof. Martine Vrijheid. My main topics of interest are the use of modern causal inference methods to answer questions in the broad field of environmental neuroepidemiology.

I received a Bachelor's degree in Biotechnology and a Master's degree in Quantitiative and Computational Biology.
